item.title: Everything what we know about OSCP
item.author: k4m1
item.description: OSCP About the post There is a brief summary of the OSCP exam. I’ve watched several videos about the exam and its preparation, and I’ve also read many blog posts. So, I’ve collected everything we need to know before attempting the exam. PEN-200 Thoughts PEN-200 Penetration Testing with Kali Linux is the name of the course while OSCP Offensive Security Certified Professional is the name of the certification. Notes Learn how to write notes.
